org.chronos.chronodb.api.builder.query

Interface QueryBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    QueryBaseBuilder<QueryBuilder>

    public interface QueryBuilder
extends QueryBaseBuilder<QueryBuilder>
    A fluent API for building queries in ChronoDB.

    Please see the individual methods for usage examples.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WhereBuilder where(java.lang.String property)
      Begins a "where" clause.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.chronos.chronodb.api.builder.query.QueryBaseBuilder

        begin, end, not

    • Method Detail

      • where

        WhereBuilder where(java.lang.String property)
        Begins a "where" clause. The supplied argument is the property which will be matched.

        Usage example: 

         tx.find().where("name").isEqualTo("Martin").getResult();
        Parameters:
        property - The property to match. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        The builder to specify the condition in. Never null.
